Welcome to the official
Web Page of Origami artist
Linda Tomoko Mihara, a specialist in the design and creation of 1,000 Origami Wedding Cranes.

This web site shows examples of her 1,000 Crane designs, her 'Multiple Crane' creations, links to sources for Origami paper and supplies and news about her upcoming book.

For custom Origami
including Origami boxes, contact Linda by clicking on the E-Mail address below. Or call
